title: Osama Maaz
author: Osama Maaz
content: Hello Mates,I am writing a post and a important thing comes to my mind that we are only person that responsible for our financial status , and dont make excuses that we belongs to poor family, If we are wasting our time on social media and not doing any work for changing your financial status then you are a looser , a lazy Looser who is passing his time for a poor death and give his children this poor life again ,                                                                        YOU ARE BORN POOR ITS NOT YOUR FAULT BUT IF YOU DIE POOR IT YOUR FAULT .

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Quote from: Osama Maaz on January 28, 2023, 06:35:46 AMHello Mates,I am writing a post and a important thing comes to my mind that we are only person that responsible for our financial status , and dont make excuses that we belongs to poor family, If we are wasting our time on social media and not doing any work for changing your financial status then you are a looser , a lazy Looser who is passing his time for a poor death and give his children this poor life again ,                                                                        YOU ARE BORN POOR ITS NOT YOUR FAULT BUT IF YOU DIE POOR IT YOUR FAULT .I understand the idea, but I won't try to say that to my neighbours. Here the minimum salary is 300usd per month, and some people cannot change of social "rank" because of their ethnicity.Everyone can do some changes and could try to save money or BTC, but not everyone will do it with success. It is not working like that in some places. This is the reason I think your idea is not fully true

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Everyone is born poor so it is up to us to change that. One cannot be lazy and stick in a dead-end job that doesn’t get you further. You cannot just sit around and wait for things to happen, you have to get up and go out there and get it done. Understand that being lazy is not a trait to carry in life, there is time and sweat to put in to survive in this world. Laying low does not get you ahead in life, it just brings you down and it will keep you in never-ending circumstances and leaves you unable to move forward. You must aim for bigger things so that bigger things can  happen in your life.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: How do you measure being poor, do you grade it by financial status & material belongings? It’s a difficult question to answer but many people who are fiat rich are actually miserable & live very sad, lonely lives.Surrounding yourself with friends, family & living a happy life means you are not poor, in some sense any way. Do not obsess with being fiat rich, it will not make you happy.

comments.author: Cineen
comments.body: The author of the topic has the right message, but there are so many BUTs! Although I agree with you in general

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: Efforts and prayers are needed. People who dream big but are still lazy will be of no use. So from now on, improve yourself, don't be lazy, and don't always complain. Actually poor people are people who are not grateful for what they are. It takes effort, but a truly rich person is one who never complains about what he has. because everything needs effort and we have to be active.

comments.author: Apraun Seupot
comments.body: I think, that spending too much time on social media or other distractions can be a hindrance when it comes to making progress towards financial stability. So, It's important to be proactive and motivated in pursuing opportunities that can help us build wealth and security. While it may not always be easy, taking responsibility for our financial situation and actively working towards our goals can make all the difference in the world.

comments.author: Klima Dorres
comments.body: I think it's important to remember that while circumstances are like being born into a low-income family can create challenges. Now, I am the same in your situation. Tough word bro, we still have agency in our own lives and can work to improve our financial situation.On the other hand, wasting time on social media and not taking action towards our goals can hold us back from achieving success.In terms of practical advice, some steps toward financial stability could include setting achievable goals, developing a budget, and actively seeking opportunities for education and career advancement.Keep in mind!! That progress takes time, so it's important to be patient and persistent in your endeavors. There's no word for late.

comments.author: ndutndut
comments.body: the last sentence you said is enough to represent my expression

comments.author: nicolas222
comments.body: Taking personal responsibility is key to changing your life. It involves making a conscious decision to change, identifying why you want to change, and defining the changes you want to make. Responsibility to yourself means respecting and using your own instincts and grappling with hard work. If you're unhappy with your life, it's your responsibility to take action and make changes. You can take responsibility for your life by setting goals, embracing discomfort, and identifying things that may hold you back.

comments.body: laziness is really not good, apart from triggering poverty and other social problems. laziness can also have an impact on the body. for example on mental, stress, anxiety, even depression. so laziness is a bad thing.
